#TITLE Kraid's Lair (Rock Remix)
#ALBUM Metroid
#COMPOSER Hirokazu Tanaka
#ARRANGED Gi Nattak

#WAVE 0x20 0xB6 ## strings (SMRPG)
#WAVE 0x21 0x1C ## bass (FF6)
#WAVE 0x22 0x97 ## overdrive guitar (SD3)
#WAVE 0x23 0x22 ## kick drum (FF6)
#WAVE 0x24 0x56 ## snare drum 2 (RS3)
#WAVE 0x25 0x0F ## closed hi-hat (FF6)
#WAVE 0x26 0x12 ## cymbal (FF6)
#WAVE 0x27 0x25 ## pipe organ (FF6)

{1}
